headline.print_headline: Rare ‘Bell Jar’ Proof To Be Auctioned
headline.main: Rare Early Proof of ‘The Bell Jar’ to Be Auctioned

snippet: A second-hand copy of the 1963 novel, written under the pseudonym Victoria Lucas, sat on a shelf for three decades. Now it’s expected to sell for a few thousand dollars.
abstract: A second-hand copy of the 1963 novel, written under the pseudonym Victoria Lucas, sat on a shelf for three decades. Now it’s expected to sell for a few thousand dollars.
